mutants.original_line: sums = [sum(map(int, str(num))) if num >= 0 else -sum(map(int, str(abs(num)))) for num in nums]
mutants.mutated_line: sums = [sum(map(int, str(num))) if num > 0 else -sum(map(int, str(abs(num)))) for num in nums]
mutants.code:
def find_sums(nums):
    sums = [sum(map(int, str(num))) if num > 0 else -sum(map(int, str(abs(num)))) for num in nums]
    sums_dict = dict(zip(nums, sums))
    max_sum = max(sums_dict.values())
    min_sum = min(sums_dict.values())
    max_nums = [num for (num, s) in sums_dict.items() if s == max_sum]
    min_nums = [num for (num, s) in sums_dict.items() if s == min_sum]
    return (sums_dict, max_nums, min_nums)

    sums = [sum(map(int, str(num))) if num >= 0 else -sum(map(int, str(abs(num)))) for num in nums]

def find_sums(nums):
    sums = [sum(map(int, str(num))) if num >= 1 else -sum(map(int, str(abs(num)))) for num in nums]
    sums_dict = dict(zip(nums, sums))
    max_sum = max(sums_dict.values())
    min_sum = min(sums_dict.values())
    max_nums = [num for (num, s) in sums_dict.items() if s == max_sum]
    min_nums = [num for (num, s) in sums_dict.items() if s == min_sum]
    return (sums_dict, max_nums, min_nums)
